snippet: PAYNE--Evelyn, 66, died peacefully in her home in Hampton Bays on Friday, February 5, 2016. She was surrounded by her large loving family. Evelyn leaves behind her beloved spouse and best friend, Elizabeth Osgood. She is survived by her mother, Helen Rathkamp, brother, Walt Rathkamp, sister, Pat Kolbus and sister-in-law, Alice Leshinski. Evelyn was Auntie Mame to her many nieces, nephews, great nieces and nephews. She was a Partner in PS Direct, Inc. She will be dearly missed by her family, many friends and colleagues. The wake will be held Sunday, February 7 between 2pm and 7pm at J. Ronald Scott Funeral Home, 20 Ponquogue Avenue, Hampton Bays, NY. The funeral will be held Monday, February 8 in the morning at the Funeral Home. The family request that donations be made to the American Heart Association. 1/3
